text.content:
Roundhouse

Crit Effect: Make one additional attack against a foe adjacent to the original target, using the same attack modifier as the original attack.

Bludgeoning

Ragged Wound

The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success].

Piercing

Delayed Wound

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target takes the same amount of damage at the end of its next two turns.

Slashing

Concussive Blast

The target is pushed up to 10 feet and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Bomb or Spell
